snippet: The Giants have gone 13-7 since Melky Cabrera was suspended after testing positive for testosterone, building their lead in the National League West to four and a half games.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that the San Francisco Giants have gone 13-7 since outfielder Melky Cabrera was suspended after testing positive for testosterone, building their lead in the National League West to four and a half games (Series: The Wild West).
lead_paragraph: The Giants have gone 13-7 since Melky Cabrera was suspended after testing positive for testosterone, building their lead in the National League West to four and a half games.

headline.seo: Without Cabrera, Giants Manage to Play Even Better
headline.main: Coming Together Without Cabrera, Giants Manage to Play Even Better
